title: "Tennis"
output: html_document
---

### 1. Load packages
```{r setup}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library (tidyverse)
library (janitor)

```

### 2. Source data 
```{r import, echo=, warning=TRUE}
tennis_raw <- readr::read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2019/2019-04-09/grand_slam_timeline.csv")

tennis <- tennis_raw %>%
   drop_na %>%
   clean_names()
   

```
```{r}

tennis %>%
   filter (year > 2011) %>%
   tabyl (tournament,year) %>%
   adorn_totals(c("row", "col")) %>%
   adorn_percentages("col") %>% 
   adorn_pct_formatting(rounding = "half up", digits = 1) %>%
   #adorn_ns() %>%
   adorn_title("combined") %>%
   knitr::kable()

```
